title: Client won't let me open store
body: I play on Mac, and when I tried to open the store I had a pop up message saying the the SSL Certificate was invalid. This message no longer appears but instead the clients turns turns white and a message shows "403 Forbidden"

replies.body: A number of players are currently having issues getting the store to load. We're working on getting the store back up, and in the meantime you can stay up to date on our progress [**here**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/lKb27XVQ-problems-getting-the-store-to-load).
